狆字的基本解释

狆
zhòng
中国西南地区布依族（包括云南省境内壮族）的旧称。亦作“仲”，称“仲家”。

狆字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhòng］
见“狆家”。

狆字的康熙字典解释

【補遺】【巳集】【犬字部】　狆； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页708第02
【字彙補】音未詳。狆宗，苗人名也。見《諸苗考》。

狆字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
狆字的起名意思

暂无。

Stubborn
Basic explanation of words
Stubborn
zhòng
The old name of the Buyi people in southwestern China (including the Zhuang people in Yunnan Province). Also known as "Zhong", called "Zhongjia".
Stubborn
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhòng］
See "Xuejia".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Addendum] [Six Collections] [Dog Character Department] 　狆; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 708 02
[Vocabulary complement] The sound is not specified. Xuanzong, the name of the Miao people. See "Zhu Miao Kao".
